column3:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard\f0 Select the appropriate country from the drop down list. The country you choose  has no practical meaning in the Enterprise component. It is only dependent on how other installed modules utilize it. The IFS/Accounting Rules component is one example. Some posting types can be governed depending on the choice of country. The available countries are those marked as Used in Application in the \b\i ISO Cod\f0 e Usage\f0 /Country\b0\i0  tab. Contact your System Administrator if a country you want to use is not visible. It is possible to change the country after saving.\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard\f0 In this field you can enter the language you want for your owner. Which language you enter for a company has no practical meaning in the Enterprise component. It is only dependent on how other installed components utilize it. The IFS/Invoice component is one example. The choice of language in the corresponding field in the \b\i Owner\b0\i0  window decides the language used in printing an invoice. Which languages you can select depends on which ones have been selected in the \b\i ISO Code Usage/Language\b0\i0  \f0 tab\f0 . Contact your System Administrator if you are missing a language you want to use. If you want, you can edit this field after saving the record. \par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard In this field, you can enter the identity of the owner. If you want to change or enter a new information about a previously entered owner in this window, you can click on Populate or Query Dialog to search for it.\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard The date on which the record was created. This value is set automatically when the record is created. This field cannot be updated.\f0\par


}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard The association number for the entity.\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard Enter a description of the owner name in the Identity field. If you want to change or enter new information about a previously entered owner in this window, you can click on Populate or Query Dialog to search for it. \par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard In this field, you can enter the identity number of the company. If you want to change or enter a new information about a previously entered company in this window, you can click on Populate or Query Dialog to search for it.\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard This column shows one's own identity versus the identity in the \b Company\b0  column. If you want, you can edit this column after saving the record.\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard In this field, you can enter the identity of the owner. If you want to change or enter a new information about a previously entered owner in this window, you can click on Populate or Query Dialog to search for it.\par
}
